alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Clarke; Jackson; Oconee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Oconee, Barrow, Clarke and southeastern Jackson Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Russell, or near Winder, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Winder, Watkinsville, Athens, Statham, Arcade, Nicholson, Winterville, Bogart, Bethlehem, Hull, Athens-Clarke County, Whitehall, Westgate Park, James Holland Youth Sports Cmpx, Bear Creek Reservoir, Fort Yargo State Park, Beechwood Hills, Sandy Creek Recreation Area, Oconee Heights and Eastville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
